statements: SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions;
SELECT participant_name, start_datetime, location FROM mediation_sessions;
SELECT mediation_id, end_datetime, description FROM mediation_sessions;
SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions ORDER BY start_datetime DESC;
SELECT participant_name, location FROM mediation_sessions WHERE mediator_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions;
SELECT participant_name, start_datetime, end_datetime FROM mediation_sessions WHERE mediator_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name FROM mediation_sessions WHERE start_datetime > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_datetime DESC;
SELECT mediator_id, location FROM mediation_sessions WHERE participant_name LIKE '%Alice%' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sessions FROM mediation_sessions WHERE mediator_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions ORDER BY start_datetime DESC;
SELECT session_id, start_datetime, end_datetime FROM mediation_sessions WHERE mediator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT session_id, COUNT(participants) AS participant_count FROM mediation_sessions GROUP BY session_id;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_datetime, participant_name FROM appointments WHERE appointment_datetime > NOW() ORDER BY appointment_datetime ASC;
SELECT session_id, mediator_name, ARRAY_LENGTH(participants) AS participant_count FROM mediation_sessions ORDER BY participant_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediation_sessions WHERE start_datetime > '2022-01-01' AND end_datetime < '2022-06-30';
SELECT session_id, start_datetime, mediator_name FROM mediation_sessions ORDER BY start_datetime DESC;
SELECT session_id, COUNT(participants) FROM mediation_sessions GROUP BY session_id HAVING COUNT(participants) > 2;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_datetime BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY appointment_datetime ASC;
SELECT a.appointment_id, a.session_id, m.mediator_name FROM appointments a INNER JOIN mediation_sessions m ON a.session_id = m.session_id WHERE m.mediator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Mediators;
SELECT name, email FROM Clients WHERE mediator_id = 1;
SELECT id, date, start_time FROM Appointments WHERE mediator_id = 2 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM Clients WHERE name LIKE 'Jo%';
SELECT id, status FROM Appointments WHERE client_id = 5 AND status = 'confirmed';
SELECT * FROM Mediators;
SELECT name, email FROM Mediators WHERE id = 1;
SELECT Clients.name, Appointments.date, Appointments.start_time, Appointments.end_time FROM Clients INNER JOIN Appointments ON Clients.id = Appointments.client_id WHERE Clients.mediator_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';

SELECT Appointments.date, Appointments.start_time, Appointments.end_time, Mediators.name AS mediator_name FROM Appointments INNER JOIN Mediators ON Appointments.mediator_id = Mediators.id WHERE Appointments.status = 'scheduled';
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT client_name, date_time FROM appointments WHERE mediator_id = 1;
SELECT mediator_name, specialty FROM mediators;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, date_time FROM appointments WHERE client_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, client_name, date_time FROM appointments WHERE mediator_id = 1;
SELECT clients.client_name, sessions.date_time FROM clients INNER JOIN sessions ON clients.client_id = sessions.appointment_id;
SELECT mediators.mediator_name, appointments.date_time FROM mediators INNER JOIN appointments ON mediators.mediator_id = appointments.mediator_id;
SELECT appointment_id, client_name, mediator_name, date_time FROM appointments INNER JOIN mediators ON appointments.mediator_id = mediators.mediator_id;
SELECT * FROM schedule ORDER BY date DESC, start_time ASC
SELECT id, location FROM schedule WHERE date='2022-05-10'
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointment LIMIT 3
SELECT description FROM schedule WHERE location='Courtroom A'
SELECT name, email FROM client JOIN appointment ON appointment.client_id = client.id
SELECT * FROM schedule ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, start_time, end_time FROM appointment WHERE appointment_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT name, email FROM client WHERE phone LIKE '%456%'
SELECT mediator_id, practice_area FROM mediator ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM calendar WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-11-01' AND '2022-11-30'
